metadata.title: CVE-2021-40568 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Gpac through 1.0.1 via a malformed MP4 file in the svc_parse_slice function in av_parsers.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service, even code execution and escalation of privileges.

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
